705546f-a.title: Brooklyn: Main Street - Front Street
705546f-a.text:
Main Street, south from Front Street, showing the Brooklyn Bridge in
the background.
June 1926.
Brown Brothers.
705546f-a.folder: Main Street & Front Street, Brooklyn, NY

704457f-a.title: Brooklyn: Front Street - Main Street
704457f-a.text:
Front Street, east from Main Street. In the background, is the Manhattan Bridge.  November 1, 1927.
P. L. Sperr
704457f-a.folder: Front Street & Main Street, Brooklyn, NY

705548f-a.title: Brooklyn: Main Street - Front Street
705548f-a.text:
50 Main Street, at the S.W. corner of Front Street.
February 3, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
705548f-a.folder: Main Street & Front Street, Brooklyn, NY

704455f-a.title: Brooklyn: Front Street - Main Street
704455f-a.text:
Front Street, south side, est from Main Street, showing partially in the background overhead the Brooklyn Bridge.
April 4, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
704455f-a.folder: Front Street & Main Street, Brooklyn, NY

704458f-a.title: Brooklyn: Front Street - Main Street
704458f-a.text:
Front Street, west from Fain to Dock Streets, showing in the background the Brooklyn Bridge approach. Also seen are the A. 2arages and Co. and the Sweeny fg. Co. buildings.
April 4, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
704458f-a.folder: Front Street & Main Street, Brooklyn, NY

704456f-a.title: Brooklyn: Front Street - Main Street
704456f-a.text:
(1)
Front Street, at the S.W. corner of Main Street.
1928.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(2)
The same, three years later.
February 5, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
704456f-a.folder: Front Street & Main Street, Brooklyn, NY

705545f-b.title: Brooklyn: Main Street - Front Street
705545f-b.text:
(1)
Main Street, west side, south from Front Street, showing the Brooklyn Bridge in the background. The peaked roof house shown in the
foreground has been unchanged in one hundred years.
July 1924.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(2)
The same, viewed in the opposite direction, showing the 10 story Sweeney Manufacturing Company building at the S.W. corner of Main and Water Streets. Also seen in the background is a partial view of the
Manhattan Bridge.
About July 1924.
Eumene L. Armbruster Collection.
705545f-b.folder: Main Street & Front Street, Brooklyn, NY

705545f-a.title: Brooklyn: Main Street - Front Street
705545f-a.text:
(1)
Main Street, west side, south from Front Street, showing the Brooklyn Bridge in the background. The peaked roof house shown in the
foreground has been unchanged in one hundred years.
July 1924.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(2)
The same, viewed in the opposite direction, showing the 10 story Sweeney Manufacturing Company building at the S.W. corner of Main and Water Streets. Also seen in the background is a partial view of the
Manhattan Bridge.
About July 1924.
Eumene L. Armbruster Collection.
705545f-a.folder: Main Street & Front Street, Brooklyn, NY

705547f-b.title: Brooklyn: Main Street - Front Street
705547f-b.text:
Main Street (left), at the S.W. corner of Front Street, showing in a set of three views, an old frame building at the corner in
existence for more than a centuly.
About 1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
705547f-b.folder: Main Street & Front Street, Brooklyn, NY
